authors.author: Francis Rous Jessie Seymour Irvine William Mure Wi

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The Lord's my Shepherd I'll not want, newline He makes me down to lie in pastures green; newline He leadeth me the quiet waters by.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My soul He doth restore again, newline And me to walk doth make; newline Within the paths of righteousness, newline E'en for His own name's sake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Yea, tho' I walk in death's dark vale, newline Yet will I fear no ill for Thou art with me newline And Thy rod and staff me comfort still.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My table Thou hast furnished newline In presence of my foes; newline My head Thou dost with oil anoint, newline And my cup overflows.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Goodness and mercy all my life newline Shall surely follow me, newline And in God's house forevermore newline My dwelling place shall be. newline Amen.
